subject: Analytics_EventCreation - Top Creators showing 'Unknown'
body:
Fulton,

The Analytics_EventCreation endpoint is live and working - nice work!

One issue: the topOrganizers array is showing 'Unknown' for all organizer names:

```
Organizer    Events
Unknown      6
Unknown      6
Unknown      4
...
```

Looks like the endpoint needs to join with the `organizers` collection to resolve the organizer names (shortName or fullName) from the organizerId.

Also, CalOps now sends `range` param (1H, 1D, 1W, 1M, 3M, 1Yr, All) instead of `days` param to match the visitor heatmap API format. If the BE doesn't support `range` yet, please add it.

Thanks!

- Dash (CalOps)
